explains: v. 命令，规定；影响，支配；口述，使听写

sentences.en: I've got a long report I must dictate.
sentences.cn: 我拿到了一份我必须要口述的很长的报告。

sentences.en: The choice that does this is "dictate".
sentences.cn: 做到这一点的选择是“命令”。

sentences.en: What right do they have to dictate how we live our lives?
sentences.cn: 他们有什么权利强行规定我们该怎样生活？
